showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ the toilet. The other restroom was closed. The shower was disgusting also, it looks like as if someone died the floor black when it was really mold. Someone would definitely need a tetanus shot right after you go in that shower. I do not ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ counter, was told it would get cleaned at next shift change at 8 am, meanwhile it is 10 pm.  Feel extremely sorry for anyone that had to use there facilities.  The shower were not fit for anyone to use, will never stop at this place again.

‚Ä¶ were expired. Need to do much better to have a pleasant experience here. Lots of "bidet bottles" laying around and bathroom floor was wet and had.....dirty toilet paper pieces around. Shower was not good and decided to get a refund.

The place is filthy. Three guys were "cleaning" the women's restroom, stood there for 20 minutes waiting finally one of them opens the "shower" rooms across the hall. If the rest rooms were anything like the shower rooms I'd be afraid to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ There are 2 side to shop at, I only visited one side.  Men's restroom was 2 stalls and 2 urinals.  1 of the toilets was backed up, but was allowed to use a shower for bathroom.  I was not taking a shower and probably glad I didn't.  Enoug ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The parking is spacious but reminds me of a Dust Bowl documentary. As an over-the-road truck driver, I have used showers at truck stops in all of the Continental States. This was the filthiest shower I have ever seen in my life. With ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . appalling I guess is a good word, although I feel it may be a little weak. Pro tip: use the bathroom in the shower, or hold it to the next convenient location.  However, when you save $.35-40 per gallon from the rest of the places on I-80 ‚Ä¶
Not one of the toilets in the ladies was in working order. All had feces and urine sitting. Had to use a shower room, same thing. Gas was more than a $1 over than other truck stops. Do not stop here.

‚Ä¶ Additionally, the women's bathroom was closed and had a sign directing women to use the shower instead, so my wife was unable to use the bathroom while we were there. Upon entering the mens bathroom myself I noticed a foul odor reminiscent ‚Ä¶
Their public bathrooms were out of service I asked to pay for a shower to use the bathroom they told me they don‚Äôt do that. Will never stop there for fuel or anything ever again

showerReviews.reviewText: I will give them five star because nice customer service clean store clean shower lot parking space for Semi Truck. What else you can ask

Went here for a shower last night. The cold water selection of the shower was not working. I asked for assistance from Rory. Was told to turn the hot water on and wait 30 minutes for the boiler to empty out. Acted like I didn't know how to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ trailer that needed changed. I was told that I would be done in 1 hour as there were 3 tech and two trucks. I told them I was heading to take a shower. I came back in an hour and was told they lost the work order. Not sure why they couldn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶
Stopped there at noon for fuel and there was no wait for a shower. Realy clean shower and lots of parking. 3 stars because they are selling spoiled rottted grapes.

We have been waiting for our shower for more than two hours. Unfortunately, the staff are walking around, drinking coffee, and chatting instead of cleaning. The shower cabins are empty ‚Äî people left more than an hour ago ‚Äî yet they remain ‚Ä¶
Why is the wait for a shower over an hour? This is the slowest loves I‚Äôve been too, and I‚Äôve been to them all! Corporate needs to talk to management here.
Avoid if you are stopping to take a quick shower‚Ä¶ almost 90 mins wait time even if there is only 1 guest in line ‚Ä¶.
The water cut off while I‚Äôm in the shower! Apparently it‚Äôs no water pressure and the water is luke warm. So I‚Äôm sitting in the shower waiting for water to rinse soap off me.

The Laramie, Wyoming Loves Travel Centeri is a must for anyone on a road trip in need of fuel, food, or showers.  This store is stocked with everything you could possibly need for a road trip almost. Super clean and organized, and has ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of parking here, even in the evening. The restrooms this last time were absolutely disgusting, though. I tried 3 different stalls, they were all horrible. Ended up waiting 15 minutes for an open shower rather than use the stalls. Do better.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ 25 minutes as every one else did. I understand maybe they had difficulties, short on staff or what not so hopefully it's  not always like that. The Pilot had a shower available right away at around  5:30 pm and the showers/ RRs were clean.
Good parking, great shower, no beer. They seemed not to care about reserved parking. All taken, some paid. So don't count on it.

The ladies who work at this pilot are all thieves, I forgot my diamond ring in the shower when I called them so I left my number 4 hours after they called me and said they found it 4 days later I went to the truck stop to retrieve it no one ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I was on the soul train ready to dance. Lol but I end up taking a shower and I notice how clean my shower was because of the smell of 409 it was a great smell and the bucket of trash was empty. So Jordan did a great job on how keeps the ‚Ä¶
Hire someone who can clean a shower room in less than 175 hours and 42 minutes.  That's how long I waited in line, I needed an IV bag to keep me alive
It sucks, I had to wait an hour for a shower during the day, there is no normal food.
I have been waiting here for an hour for a shower, all the showers are empty, they are not cleaning the showers, the staff is very lazy.

Clean, bathroom, and very clean showers.   We'll stocked.  Freindly and helpful staff.  Stayed on top of shower cleaning during high demand.  Small with no driver lounge.  Slot machines.  Parking small with 1/2 reserve.   (Love's and Petro ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower sketchy.  Crap squeegee. Expired products.  No hot food at all. It's 8. Yall have lost the whole company I work for. We have 7 guys in this lot ready to eat n fuel. Have to wait an hour for drivers to get out the fuel line.

‚Ä¶ fueling at the Petro/TA earning platinum status for years. I‚Äôd appreciate coming in off of the road to relax, shower, or eat without being treated like a 2nd class citizen for no reason. That goose egg she got in the tip section of my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ranch, marinara, tartar sauce or salads.  We went to the TV lounge but some lady had her cat in there with her.  Our shower was nice and clean but there is no ventilation.  Everything was sweating and wet.  We went up front to look for a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ travel center and what‚Äôs left of the restaurant where it‚Äôs nice and cool , it was a boiler room in that tiny little shower box couldn‚Äôt get dried off for immediately going to sweating cause it was so hot in there and yes I had that little ‚Ä¶
My wife and I were at the main Fuel island today to take a shower and the nicest Custodian that cleans our showers John ‚Ä¶

very impressed with John, the inside porter.  He helped me and was very friendly.  He assisted me with my shower and made sure I felt safe and welcomed.  I would be glad to come back and get same service again!

Stopped here to shower. The water was hot but that's about the only good thing. They have too much water softener, the entire shower room was filthy and overall experience was not good. There was even a used q-tip on the switch box by the ‚Ä¶

I give the restaurant 5 stars but the person cleaning the shower gets 0 stars.. it was so dirty.. man STUFF!!! on the wall! .. wasted $16 and kid up front just didn't seem to care. Very disgusted ü§¢üò§üò° ‚Ä¶

Someone who cleans the showers in that gas station was asking my 11year old daughter for bus ticket while she was in the shower. I called the police and filed a report but that before he drove away. the manager clearly didn't care
Nice hot water. The towels were damp wet. Shower was okay! Good coffee! Nice gentleman at the front counter.

Excellent Pilot, clean, bright, comfortable.  Incredibly friendly staff.  The shower deserves special praise.  12 showers.  The water pressure and temperature are some of the best I've seen.

It was rosaceted that there was no paper at all in the women's toilet and it was dirty .. all the necessary urgent tools for transport can be found here.  you can still eat if you wish .. and the shower is more or less cleaned
Everything one might need at the truck stop plus more to include Dennys Dining. Pizza slices are good after the shower.
You have to wait for hours to get a shower and  the people work there they really don‚Äôt care

This is the cleanest shower room I ever been in that I had to leave a tip. I never done that before!

Also easy parking if you get here before 6pm

The work is not organized at all.

Tons of signs for luxurious trucker showers $18 ... I've been in no name truck stop with cleaner and nicer facilities the shower room was tiny not so much as a towel run over the counter since whoever showered before us. Toilet was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to trucks, it's catered to tourists. They have the fueling islands with a little store where you can shower (wonderful bathrooms btw), but the big store and restaurant etc is away from truck parking. (No trucks allowed) you have to walk ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and when they are cought they try to take it out on the truck drivers.  I hope there is no future problems like the one i had this afternoon.  There is cheep fuel, clean shower, a nice golf course, and a restaurant/bar in the hotel.

‚Ä¶ ok. I came before and got to take a nice bath, with bubble bath. And I was so disappointed to see the ‚ôø shower where the water runs on the floor. Had to put towels down so it wouldn't  go on the carpet it was all the same level.  And I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 2) Shower looks nice with marble wall n floor. However NO ventilation n its like a Sauna. ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ so low. We pulled in after 9pm (30-foot RV) and there was ample parking that wasn't next to truck so we were well out of their way. The shower ($7) was clean, warm with good pressure. The coffee was great in the morning. Would totally stop ‚Ä¶

Best Sapp Bros location I've been to!  Nicest showers I've ever used of any truck stop I've been to in America (probably 200 different ones). Very good service!  Nicest truck stop I'm Wyoming for sure.  The couples shower is highly ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ For travels the showers and restrooms are very clean. ‚Ä¶
This location is amazing. Store was super clean, employees friendly & I love that they had a couple‚Äôs shower as my husband and I drive together. Keep up the good work guys!

Nice staff. Private shower rooms are VERY nice. Way better than the other major fuel stations. They had a large walk in shower, large area for toilet, sink, bench, wall hooks. It was extremely clean, I mean not even water spots on the ‚Ä¶

I usually stop in at night, it's quieter. However went there this morning for a shower, and the morning shift staff are quite snobby and rude. Definitely gonna file a complaint with management, won't be the first time.Supposed to be family ‚Ä¶

Last time I took a shower here, the showers were over in the motel.
Now they are in the building and they are nice! One of the nicest showers I've had in a while. Well worth the $15.

‚Ä¶ go to Sapp Brothers frequently as we are on the road alot.  This one in particular has very clean restrooms/shower room with nice heavy towels, the staff is friendly.  We've eaten in the restaurant twice and I would say it's a little ‚Ä¶

Parking fills up fast in the lot, just swing around and park on the huge shoulder across from the place. Nice restaurant inside. One of the best steaks you'll ever eat at T-Joes next door.

No longer have bidet toilets in the shower rooms.
